title: You are now logged out.
details_head: Other apps won't tell you but logging out is not enough.
details_1: Twitchat app still, theoretically, has access to your account.
details_2: You may want to also revoke access to the app from your Twitch account.
details_3: Scroll down to the Other Connections section, find TwichatApp entry and click Disconnect button.
